meanings.definition: having the most glint or sparkle
meanings.sent1: The glintiest stars filled the night sky with their shimmering light.
meanings.sent2: Her glintiest earrings caught the sunlight and sparkled beautifully.
meanings.sent3: The glintiest diamond in the store was so bright, it almost blinded me!
meanings.sent4: The glintiest smile on her face lit up the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The glintiest dew on the grass made it look like a field of diamonds.

meanings.sent1: The glintiest moonlight illuminated the path through the forest.
meanings.sent2: His glintiest shoes reflected the light as he walked down the street.
meanings.sent3: The glintiest flashlight in the house always mysteriously turned on by itself.
meanings.sent4: The glintiest eyes in the room seemed to see right through me.
meanings.sent5: The glintiest smile on her face lit up the entire room.

meanings.definition: showing a quick flash of light
meanings.sent1: The glintiest reflection off the water caught my eye.
meanings.sent2: The glintiest lightning bolt streaked across the dark sky.
meanings.sent3: The glintiest camera flash made everyone blink for a moment.
meanings.sent4: Her glintiest sword gleamed as she raised it in victory.
meanings.sent5: The glintiest star in the sky seemed to wink at me.
